top_comments.comment: Why does no one ever mention how tall your night stand should be? Beds and night stands come in all different heights. What's the ideal height pairing?

I wish I was rich enough to have a bed that looked like any of these pictures and the time to rearrange pillows but I'm a shift working medical professional so I'll just have to hope I don't die before I retire and achieve this level of 'bed goals' one day 🙃👍🏻

Hey Nick, during your asymmetry bit, I was hoping to see an asymmetrical bedroom. But I saw symmetrical bedrooms with touches of asymmetry. I’d love for you to do some truly asymmetrical bedrooms, as I have one by room size necessity, and am curious how my design fares with the experts.
So I know rugs on carpet is a faux pas, but how do you feel about a rug on carpet in a bedroom?
Loved the sheet set till I got to the pillows and only option was DOWN. 😩 you don’t have to be vegan to know you don’t want to sleep on feathers ripped out of geese

comments_since_last_sample.body: Finally, a sponsor where I can probably buy something lol.
Love the photo example of Too many pillows on the bed, hahaha. Liked your guidance on balance versus symmetrical.
There are actually two pendants on both sides in that black bedroom, they just line up, you can see two wires.
So I know rugs on carpet is a faux pas, but how do you feel about a rug on carpet in a bedroom?
You see "To many pillows in a bed" as mistake!? Where is the "Unsubscribe" button! I shall press it twice to show you how angry I am :-D

Affordable linens with a luxury feel,  
I like Costco's linens. 
A Queen set w 4 pillow cases $90.
At 9:41 there's a photo of a bedroom with with some lovely lamps on the nightstands. Do you know where I could get them? They look fab!
Love Brooklinen! Have their sheets on all our beds.
how do i get my brooklinen linen sheets & duvet cover from pilling?? it is insane!!!! i simply walk by them and any dark clothes are covered linen dust! help!
